308020.name: Fantasy Grounds - Call of Cthulhu: Shadows of Yog-Sothoth
308020.description:
A Call of Cthulhu Adventure module for Fantasy Grounds
A GLOBAL CAMPAIGN TO SAVE MANKIND!
The Silver Twilight is an international organization dedicated to the destruction
of the human race. As brave Investigators, you must piece together passages from
esoteric books, shards of ancient artifacts, and puzzling letters to discover the
Silver Twilight's loathsome goals. This multi-chapter adventure begins in Boston
and spans the globe. The Investigators must survive and conquer the mind-shattering
monsters and minions of the Cthulhu Mythos. Come, journey through awesome realms
of reality, and match your wits and sanity against diabolical lurkers in SHADOWS
OF YOG-SOTHOTH!
SHADOWS OF YOG-SOTHOTH is a seven-chapter tale of horror and suspense.
By Sandy Petersen and friends.
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Call of
Cthulhu ruleset.
Conversion by: Arnuphis
The reproduction of material from within this product for the purposes of personal
or corporate profit, by file, photographic, optical, electronic, or other media
or methods of storage and retrieval, is prohibited.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Barrie Clark
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Call of Cthulhu ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
